snippet: Attorney General Doug Gansler has taken steps that could result in the revocation of death sentences for four inmates who were sentenced before the state abolished capital punishment last year.
abstract: Maryland Atty Gen Doug Gansler takes steps that could result in the revocation of death sentences for four inmates who were sentenced before the state abolished capital punishment in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Doug Gansler has taken steps that could result in the revocation of death sentences for four inmates who were sentenced before the state abolished capital punishment last year.

headline.main: Maryland: Door Opened to Revoking Death Sentences
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Door Opened to Revoking Death Sentences
